title: Kalvaria hnehna ropui chu
lyrics:
Kalvaria hnehna ropui chu,
Angel-in an fak ning lo va;
Mipuiin an chawimawi chiam ang,
Khawvel chhandamtu thisenin;
Mi boral tlanin an awm,
Hmelmate inremin an awm.

Tlang zawng zawng aiin Kalvari,
A ropui zawk em em a ni;
Chutah chhandamna hnar a lang,
Mihring khawvelah a luang tlang,
Mi zawng zawng a tinung leh ang,
Kumkhaw nunna tui a ni ang.
